text:
In ant 1.6.1beta1 (compiled on January 29 2004 and older versions) on z/OS 
(Java 1.3.1) the <input> task displays the prompt after entering the data.  I 
can get around this by creating a custom inputhandler (based on 
DefaultInputHandler.java) and adding a System.err.flush(); statement after the 
System.err.println(prompt); statement.
